title: Chiefs find playoff form, Buccaneers win with ease, Cowboys final call questioned, Cardinals vs Rams tonight, Murray or Stafford?
itunes:title: Chiefs find playoff form, Buccaneers win with ease, Cowboys final call questioned, Cardinals vs Rams tonight, Murray or Stafford?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson discuss the Chiefs clicking on all cylinders against the Steelers, who will now likely look for their QB of the future. The Buccaneers made it look easy against the Eagles and Peter thinks Tampa is being overlooked. The Cowboys couldn't complete a comeback against the 49ers and their final play will be questioned the rest of the offseason. All eyes are on Kyler Murray and Matt Stafford tonight in Los Angeles, but Kyle says it's now or never for the Rams QB.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
